### arithematic operators


```python
#arithematic operators
#cancatenation of string
a='rani'
b='sangshetti'
print('concatenation of a&b is:',a+"  "+b)


```

    concatenation of a&b is: rani  sangshetti
    


```python
a=534
b=735
print("addition of two nos:",a+b)
```

    addition of two nos: 1269
    

print("substarction of two nos:",a-b)


```python
print("multiplication of string:",a*b)
```

    multiplication of string: 392490
    


```python
print("division of two nos:",a/b)
```

    division of two nos: 0.726530612244898
    


```python
print("reminder:",a%b)
```

    reminder: 534
    


```python
print("power:",a**b)
```

    power: 
    


```python
### assignment operator

```


```python
a=14     
```


```python
a+=1       #value will increment by one(increment operator)
print(a)
```

    16
    


```python
a-=1       #value will decrement  by one(decrement oeprator)
print(a)
```

    15
    


```python
a*=2
print(a)
```

    30
    


```python
a/=2
print(a)
```

    15.0
    

###comparison operator


```python
a=425
b=735
```


```python
a==b           #equality operator
```




    False




```python
a!=b              #unequality opeartor
```




    True




```python
a>=b             #greater than equal to
```




    False




```python
a<=b             #less than equal to
```




    True




```python
a>b       #greater than
```




    False




```python
a<b           #less than
```




    True




